wikipedia_page.main: Flight Sub-Lieutenant Harold Day  (17 April 1897 – 5 February 1918) was a Welsh World War I flying ace credited with 11 confirmed aerial victories.

response: *Harold Day (Royal Navy officer) (1897–1918), Welsh-born World War I flying ace
